welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mount Laurel, a charming city known for its historic sites, natural beauty, and welcoming community. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all that it has to offer. We hope your stay here is filled with wonderful memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights and is home to United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple sign-in process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
